oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Portrait of Pvt. Andrew J. Sherrill
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This oval framed photograph shows a head and shoulders portrait of Pvt. Andrew J. Sherrill, b. 1890 d. 1980, in a World War, 1914-1918, uniform complete with collar discs. His head is uncovered and he looks directly at the camera. Sherrill served with 26th Machine Gun Battn. 45th Inf.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Sherrill, Andrew J.
World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
